description: This is a React component implementing a reusable bar chart using the Recharts library. It accepts data and configuration through props and renders a responsive chart inside a styled card.

methods.name: BarChart({ data, color = "#0D9488", xKey = "label", yKey = "value", title = "Breakdown" })
methods.description: Functional React component that renders a responsive bar chart with the given data and configuration.
